procedure.title: Macroom Garda Divisional HQ - Fire Safety Consultancy Services
procedure.description:
**Title: Macroom Garda Divisional HQ - Fire Safety Consultancy Services**

**Description:**
The Office of Public Works (OPW) is seeking a qualified consultant to provide comprehensive Fire Safety Consultancy Services for the Macroom Garda Divisional HQ. The successful bidder will be responsible for conducting a thorough assessment of the existing fire safety measures, identifying any deficiencies, and recommending necessary improvements to ensure compliance with current Irish fire safety regulations and standards.

The consultancy services should include, but are not limited to:
- Conducting a detailed fire risk assessment of the building.
- Evaluating the current fire safety systems, including alarms, sprinklers, and emergency lighting.
- Identifying any potential fire hazards and recommending mitigation strategies.
- Developing a fire safety management plan tailored to the specific needs of the Macroom Garda Divisional HQ.
- Providing training and awareness programs for staff on fire safety procedures.
- Ensuring that all recommendations are aligned with the latest Irish fire safety legislation and best practices.

The successful consultant will have extensive experience in fire safety consultancy, a strong understanding of Irish fire safety regulations, and the ability to work collaboratively with the OPW team. The consultancy should be completed within a specified timeframe, with regular progress updates and a final report detailing all findings and recommendations.

For more detailed information, please refer to the Statement of Work (SAQ) provided by the OPW. The successful bidder will be required to demonstrate their expertise and capability in delivering high-quality fire safety consultancy services, ensuring the safety of personnel and property within the Macroom Garda Divisional HQ.
